short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play a random episode of a Netflix TV Show.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you don't care which episode of your favorite TV series you want to watch, because any one of them is better than the others! Click on the TV series, and then click on the Extension's button. A random episode of that TV series will be played.

Link to demo:  
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tMATA2AFkMU
